name: High Stakes (byylan)
description:
In High Stakes, hire climbers to make some money! Purchase upgrades and become the #1 Climber Boss!

Controls:

Left click on a climber's screen to clear boulders falling down the mountain. Right click on a climber's screen to recall the climber and get the money they've racked up. Use the space bar and the 1-4 keys to hire climbers more efficiently.

Credits:

Lead Designer: Redhead-O-Rama

Programmer, Misc: Byylan

Sprite Artist: Ch3llx

Music: Johnny Mayo

Sound Effects: Freesounds.org

GUI and Fonts: Kenney.nl

Available for Windows 10, Mac OSX, and Linux.

This game was made for the VimJam 2.
